## NOTIFICATION\_MESSAGE\_SERVICE variable

Token for injecting service that can be used for obtaining type of component for notification message

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE_SERVICE: InjectionToken<NotificationMessageService<any, NotificationMessageOptions<any>>>
```
